LC50 Oryzias latipes (Japanese medaka) 5.1 mg/L/48 hr /Conditions of bioassay not specified/

LC50 Pimephales promelas (Fathead minnow, 31 day old) 3.79 mg/L/96 hr @ 24.9 °C (95% CI: 3.47-4.14 mg/L); flow through, dissolved oxygen 7.3 mg/L, hardness 48.0 mg/L as calcium carbonate, alkalinity 43.1 mg/L as calcium carbonate, pH 7.8 /99+% pure/

EC50 Pimephales promelas (Fathead minnow, 31 day old) affected fish lost schooling behavior, were hypoactive, swam near the tank bottom and were darly colored. 3.63 mg/L/96 hr @ 24.9 °C (95% CI: 3.31-3.99 mg/L); flow through, dissolved oxygen 7.3 mg/L, hardness 48.0 mg/L as calcium carbonate, alkalinity 43.1 mg/L as calcium carbonate, pH 7.8 /99+% pure/
